title: Windows 7 SP1 Ultimate X64 Multi-8 Pre-Activated Aug 2014
description:
Windows 7 SP1 Ultimate x64 Multi8 Pre-Activated Aug 2014


[ RELEASE INFO ]

  * This release contains one ISO [SOURCE ISO] and seven exe-files.
  * All exe-files are created from original MSDN ISO's for each language.
  * This is done with SmartVersion, a program that calculates only the 
    difference between two files (one of which is used as the source) 
    and then creates an exe-file based on that difference.


[ DOWNLOAD INFO ]

  * Download the Source ISO and preferred language.exe
  * If you want en-US then just download the SOURCE ISO
 
  * Run the exe-file in the same folder as the SOURCE ISO.
    This will extract & recreate the original ISO, fully updated,
    in the selected language.
    

[ LANGUAGES & SOURCES ]

  * en-US  [English]      X17-59465
  * de-DE  [German]	  X17-59885
  * es-ES  [Spanish]	  X17-58879
  * fi-FI  [Finnish] 	  X17-59194 
  * fr-FR  [French]	  X17-59479
  * it-IT  [Italian]	  X17-59215
  * pt-PT  [Portuguese]	  X17-59247
  * sv-SE  [Swedish]	  X17-59273 


[SOURCE ISO]

  * Win7.x64.en-US.iso  Size: 4,40GB


[ EXE-FILES ]			
 
  * Win7.x64.de-DE.exe	Size: 389MB
 
  * Win7.x64.es-ES.exe	Size: 342MB

  * Win7.x64.fi-FI.exe	Size: 337MB

  * Win7.x64.fr-FR.exe	Size: 358MB

  * Win7.x64.it-IT.exe	Size: 319MB

  * Win7.x64.pt-PT.exe	Size: 307MB

  * Win7.x64.sv-SE.exe	Size: 305MB


[ CONTENTS ]

  * USB3, Sata and Network drivers attached separately ($WinPEDriver$).
  * Hashes attached in a separate .txt 

  Integrated / Pre-installed in Audit Mode:

  * .NET Framework 4.5.3  
  * IE 11
  * Hotfixes - 2014-08-12

   Setupcomplete / Post-install:

  * DirectX June 2010
  * KB890930
  * Defender Updates


[ FEATURES ]
  
  * Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset 7 (Microsoft DaRT)


[ EDITIONS INCLUDED ]

  * Windows 7 Ultimate
  * Windows 7 Ultimate		Pre-Activated


[ INSTALLATION ]

  * Create bootable USB 2.0 (highly recommended), minimum 8GB,
    with Rufus (attached) or burn to DVD at slow speed.


[ CREDITS TO ]

  * Iggepop - exe-design
  * Generation2 - .NET integration
 

  Hope you will enjoy this release!

  Regards,
  Generation2
